Q: Remove a brand sticker from a two liter plastic  pop bottle
O: (A) Fill an empty clean plastic 2 liter pop bottle with cold water, place the cap on and tighten, pour a table spoon of cooking oil onto the    brand sticker and rub the oil all over the sticker. Let sit 10 minutes, take your fingers and peel the sticker off slowly until the sticker is completely removed. (B) Fill an empty clean 2 liter plastic pop bottle with hot water, place the cap on and tighten, pour a table spoon of cooking oil onto the    brand sticker and rub the oil all over the sticker. Let sit 10 minutes, take your fingers and peel the sticker off slowly until the sticker is completely removed.
